description: V2 of scanner-context enhancement using new hierarchical session pattern with agent subdirectories, improved validation, and structured phase gates

orchestrator.role: Coordinate Phase 1 enhancement across 2 primary agents, validate phase gates, synthesize results
orchestrator.notes: Phase 1 synthesis complete. Both agents achieved 100% task completion with all success metrics met. See orchestrator-phase1-synthesis.md for full report.

agents.role: Phase 1 Lead: Enhance coderef_context tool from 40% to 95% context quality
agents.notes: 7/7 tasks complete. Context quality: 40% → 95%, tool calls: 6 → 1, response time: 0.5s → ≤0.1s. Created 3 analyzers (pattern, validation, complexity), populated 3 JSON reports. See coderef-context-phase1-output.json.

agents.role: Phase 1 Lead: Scanner quick wins (pattern ordering, presets, error reporting)
agents.notes: 4/4 tasks complete. Scanner performance: +15% (1185ms → 1007ms), setup time: 10min → 30sec (9 presets), Python coverage: 60% → 90%. Added 721 lines (presets.ts, error-reporter.ts), 0 breaking changes. See coderef-core-phase1-quickwins.md.
